title: Risen FiddleSticks bug
body: if a Risen fiddlesticks stands for 2 seconds he freezes. till u move him again

replies.body:
That happens with every Fiddlesticks skin IIRC.

They added it a couple patches ago.  It's in the patch notes.
Yup! This occurs on all Fiddlesticks skins and the base - it's working as intended!
The notes literally said if he doesn't move for 5 seconds, he becomes a spooky scarecrow.
